channel.title: Xbox 360-Cod4 Clan recruiting
channel.description:
We are now open for Try-Outs! We are a dedicated clan there to RAPE the PISS out of SCRUBS!!! :D:D:D:D:D:D Okay,anyways. ------------------------------------------------------------ We are accepting anyone in their 1st presteige+,well if ur 55 and u don't wanna join,thats fine;you can still try out. A little about the clan/members: The clan is called (xDhx,oDHo,-DH-,Direct Hit)
[b]Co-Leader #1-[/b]InFeRno0132342 [b]Co-Leader #2-[/b]Destroyer132 [b]Captain-[/b]*Open* [b]Recruiter-[/b]InFeRno0132342 [center][b]Normal Members:[/b][/center] [center]GuitarGuy64 xxTEEZYxx OxSpecial opSxO IckyS UltimateAthlete[/center]
[b]Clan Matches:[/b] If you would like to have a clan match Please add my Gamertage(Reload And Die) And we can work things out.
[b]How the matches work:[/b] [b]Team deathmatch-[/b]We can work out in game,Best 2 out of 3. [b]Search & Destory-[/b]We can work out in game,Usually 4 to 8 points. [b]Sabotage-[/b]We Don't Play. [b]Domination-[/b]We Don't Play. [b]Free-For-All-[/b]In a clan match? Rofl. [b]Headquarters-[/b]We can work out rules in game,Best out of 1 game-Because 15 minutes.
[b]Our record:[/b] We are now 5-0 Not 1 loss yet,But still not alot of wins;We need clan matches.
[b]Also:[/b] If we are to have a clan match,I don't want any of our clan members fighting/Cursing at one another.We will report ANY one cursing or fighting with another clan member.

item.title: Xbox 360-Cod4 Clan recruiting
item.dc:creator: @GoldenScape GoldenScape
item.description:
@GoldenScape wrote:

We are now open for Try-Outs!
We are a dedicated clan there to RAPE the PISS out of SCRUBS!!! :D:D:D:D:D:D
Okay,anyways.

We are accepting anyone in their 1st presteige+,well if ur 55 and u don’t wanna join,thats fine;you can still try out.
A little about the clan/members:
The clan is called (xDhx,oDHo,-DH-,Direct Hit)

Co-Leader #1-InFeRno0132342
Co-Leader #2-Destroyer132
Captain-Open
Recruiter-InFeRno0132342
[center]Normal Members:[/center]
[center]GuitarGuy64
xxTEEZYxx
OxSpecial opSxO
IckyS
UltimateAthlete[/center]

Clan Matches:
If you would like to have a clan match Please add my Gamertage(Reload And Die) And we can work things out.

How the matches work:
Team deathmatch-We can work out in game,Best 2 out of 3.
Search & Destory-We can work out in game,Usually 4 to 8 points.
Sabotage-We Don’t Play.
Domination-We Don’t Play.
Free-For-All-In a clan match? Rofl.
Headquarters-We can work out rules in game,Best out of 1 game-Because 15 minutes.

Our record:
We are now 5-0
Not 1 loss yet,But still not alot of wins;We need clan matches.

Also:
If we are to have a clan match,I don’t want any of our clan members fighting/Cursing at one another.We will report ANY one cursing or fighting with another clan member.

Read full topic
